ads.description: ...When the power is insufficient in your device, you can click OPTIMIZE mode to activate the mode. At the time the following changes will occur : inactivate WIFI, Bluetooth, GPS location system, background light、vibration and synchronization; Activate silent mode. You can also press “setting”button to personalize items you want to close...
Fast Charging is an ultimate tool, which can boost your battery charging speed by 20-40%. This app will automatically activate when you connect your charger and it will boost your charging speed.

Lock SMS, Contacts, Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, Messenger and lock any private apps., Lock apps content your important data like Gallery, Files Manager, Calendar..., Lock the Setting, Android system, Install/Uninstall apps, Google Play Store, Phone and anything apps you choose to protect.
